recovery_phrase_description: Do not share these words in the correct order. They make the recovery phrase for your new account.
double_check_description: You need to choose 8 correct words to complete
new_password_description: Prompt for creating new password for Casper wallet.
welcome_back_description: The era of decentralized computing is here
send_description: Send your token the fastest and easy way.
receiving_address_note: Only send {{ asset }} to this address. Sending any other asset to this address may result in the loss of  your deposit!
warning_close_window: 'Closing this window will result in the disconnection from your DApp. Please ensure that you have saved all necessary data and completed all tasks before proceeding'
default_error_message: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
are_you_sure_delete_all_data: Are you sure delete all data?
delete_all_data_description: This action is irreversible and will result in the permanent loss of all data, including your private keys, public keys, transaction history, and any other information associated with your wallet.
name: Name
this_is_your_private_key: This is your private key (click to copy)
warning_private_key_message: Keep this key confidential at all times. Revealing your private keys can enable anyone to pilfer any assets stored in your account.
lock_wallet_description: We wanted to remind you of the importance of securing your wallet by locking it. Locking your wallet is a recommended security measure that can help protect your funds from unauthorized access or potential hacks.
are_you_sure_lock_wallet: Are you sure lock your wallet?
feedback_placeholder: You can either leave feedback on the form itself, write a Medium blog or create a YouTube video about it. If you use Medium or YouTube, please provide us with a link. Once you have submitted your feedback, please tweet your feedbacks also. Tag @casperdash_io and use the hashtag #CasperDash_Retroactive.
airdrop_description_1: You need to claim the unique Code to join the Retroactive program. Please follow these simple steps:
airdrop_description_2: 1Ô∏è‚É£ Join our official CasperDash Retroactive Bot
airdrop_description_3: 2Ô∏è‚É£ Enter the code provided by CasperDash Retroactive Bot to join the testing
you_are_already_a_full_delegator: The node has reached the maximum delegator capacity and cannot accept new delegations at this time
please_enter_a_valid_amount: The entered amount is below the minimum required. Please input an amount greater than or equal to {{val}} CSPR
password_min_characters: Password should be at least {{ val }} characters long.
password_include_letters: Password must include at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one numeric digit, and one special character.
airdrop_successfully_submitted: Thanks for your valuable feedbacks. Enjoy your Defi journey with CasperDash.
list_for_sale_description: Enter price and for your new listing
cancel_listing_description: Will remove your NFT from the marketplace
transaction_sent_description: Your transaction has been sent to the network. It may take a few minutes to be confirmed.
